dt2.1:5.1: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:5.2: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:5.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito. #1
dt2.1:6.1: Vedanākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:6.2: Vedanākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:6.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito. #2
dt2.1:7.1: Saññākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:7.2: Saññākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:7.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito. #3
dt2.1:8.1: Saṅkhārakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:8.2: Saṅkhārakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:8.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito. #4
dt2.1:9.1: Viññāṇakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:9.2: Viññāṇakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:9.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito. #5
dt2.1:11.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:11.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:11.4: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #1
dt2.1:12.3: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:12.5: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #2
dt2.1:13.3: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:13.5: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #3
dt2.1:14.3: dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:14.5: Tīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #4
dt2.1:16.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:16.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:16.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #1
dt2.1:17.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca … pe … tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:17.5: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #2
dt2.1:18.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca … pe … tīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:18.5: Dvīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #3
dt2.1:20.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:20.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:20.4: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:21.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca … pe … catūhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:21.5: Ekena khandhena, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:23.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:23.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:23.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:24.1: Pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:24.2: Pañcakkhandhā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:24.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:27.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ?
dt2.1:27.2: Cakkhāyatanaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:27.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:28.11: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:28.13: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:29.1: Manāyatanaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:29.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:30.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:30.3: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:32.1: Cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:32.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:33.8: cakkhāyatanañca phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:33.10: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.1: Cakkhāyatanañca manāyatanañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.1: Cakkhāyatanañca dhammāyatanañca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:37.1: Dvādasāyatanāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:37.2: Dvādasāyatanāni asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:37.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:40.2: Cakkhudhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:50.1: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:50.2: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:50.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:80.1: Bāvīsatindriyāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?
dt2.1:80.2: Bāvīsatindriyāni catūhi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:80.4: Ekena khandhena pañcahāyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:82.1: Avijjā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:82.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:83.1: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:83.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:84.1: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.
dt2.1:84.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:86.3: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:191.5: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:192.1: Ajjhattikā dhammā dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:192.3: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:193.1: Bāhirā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:193.3: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:194.1: Upādā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:194.3: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:195.1: No upādā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:195.3: Na kehici khandhehi navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:196.1: Upādinnā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:196.3: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:197.1: Anupādinnā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:197.3: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:199.5: kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:199.7: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:200.3: kilesavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:200.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:201.2: saṃkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā …
dt2.1:201.3: kilesavippayuttā saṃkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:201.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:202.2: kilesavippayuttā asaṃkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:202.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:203.3: saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā …
dt2.1:203.4: kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:203.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:205.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:205.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:206.4: na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:206.6: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:207.2: savicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:207.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:208.2: avicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:208.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:209.2: pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:209.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:210.3: na sukhasahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:210.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:211.1: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:211.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:212.1: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:212.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:213.1: Na upekkhāsahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:213.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:214.3: sauttarā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:214.5: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:215.3: anuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:215.5: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:216.5: saraṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:216.7: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:217.5: araṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:217.6: Araṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:217.8: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
